ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Contract Status is terminated when stage is moved to discontinued.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Corporate_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discontinued"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( CLMS_Contract_Status__c , "Terminated")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract status must be Terminated in order to discontinue at this stage
